title: and after the seasonal rains annual grasses and other small herbs appear. 409. Western Evergreen Forest. The western evergreen forest extends in general from Alaska to southern Mexico, and may be divided roughly into two areas: the Rocky Mountain forest and the Pacific Coast forest. Conifers are the chief forest trees in both areas. The Rocky Mountain forest stretches along the Rockies from northern British Columbia to southern Mexico
